  • 方法详细资料

    • createAsset

      public <T extends Asset> void createAsset(String name, IAssetTypeProvider type, @Nullable @Nullable Consumer<T> consumer, IFileProvider provider)
      Create an asset. Not loaded.
      类型参数:
      T - The asset type.
      参数:
      name - The asset original name.
      type - The asset type provider.
      consumer - The consumer to be accepted before loading asset.
      provider - The file provider.

    • createAsset

      public void createAsset(String name, IAssetTypeProvider type, IFileProvider provider)
      Create an asset. Not loaded.
      参数:
      name - The asset original name.
      type - The asset type provider.
      provider - The file provider.

    • addAsset

      public <T extends Asset> void addAsset(String name, IAssetTypeProvider type, @Nullable @Nullable Consumer<T> consumer, IFileProvider provider, Supplier<Asset> supplier)
      Add an asset.
      类型参数:
      T - The asset type.
      参数:
      name - The asset original name.
      type - The asset type provider.
      consumer - The consumer to be accepted before loading asset.
      provider - The file provider.
      supplier - The asset supplier to get lazily.

    • addAsset

      provider - The file provider.

    • reloadAssets

      public void reloadAssets(boolean force, boolean forcePerAsset)
      Reload all created assets.
      参数:
      force - Force reloads in frozen state if true.
      forcePerAsset - Force reloads per assets if true.
      另请参阅:
      • reloadAssets(boolean)

    • getAsset

      public <T extends Asset> Optional<T> getAsset(String name) throws RuntimeException, ClassCastException
      Get the asset from created assets.
      类型参数:
      T - The asset type.
      参数:
      name - The asset name or alias.
      返回:
      The asset.
      抛出:
      RuntimeException - If asset not found.
      ClassCastException - If value is not an instance of T

      参数:
